Foundational Mathematics.name: Arithmetic
Foundational Mathematics.description: Integers, divisibility, factorization, primes, operations, roots; estimation, percent, ratio, absolute value, sequences.

Foundational Mathematics.name: Elementary Algebra
Foundational Mathematics.description: Exponents, factoring, simplifying expressions; relations, functions, equations, inequalities; solving linear/quadratic equations; coordinate geometry basics.

Foundational Mathematics.name: Geometry
Foundational Mathematics.description: Lines, circles, triangles, polygons, congruence/similarity, 3D figures, area, perimeter, volume; Pythagorean theorem and basic angle measurements.

Foundational Mathematics.name: Statistics & Probability
Foundational Mathematics.description: Descriptive statistics, data interpretation; probability of events, distributions, (basic) counting methods like combinations and permutations.
